name: So Delicious Dairy Free Coconut Milk Yogurt Alternative, Unsweetened, Vanilla, Vegan, Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Creamy Plant Based Yogurt Alternative, 24 oz Container
short_description: A CREAMY DELIGHT: Enjoy our unsweetened vanilla coconutmilk yogurt alternative on its own or with your favorite toppings, from granola to diced fruits
GREAT FOR DAIRY-FREE LIFESTYLES: Our plant-based yogurt alternative is dairy-, lactose-, soy-, and gluten-free
MADE WITH ORGANIC COCONUTMILK as part of our commitment to high-quality ingredients
AVAILABLE IN SO MANY BELOVED FLAVORS, including strawberry banana, raspberry, key lime, and more
VEGAN AND NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED; no artificial flavors, hydrogenated oils, added MSG, or trans-fats
product_description: A wondrous wave of creamy goodness awaits in every spoonful of So Delicious Dairy Free Unsweetened Vanilla Coconutmilk Yogurt Alternative. Close your eyes and treat yourself to a moment of bliss as the silky tide of coconutmilk mingles with the smooth trickle of unsweetened vanilla. And if you’re feeling adventurous, try sprinkling in a pinch of granola or your favorite diced fruits. We make this luscious yogurt alternative with organic coconuts and no dairy, lactose, soy, or gluten, so you can relish in the joys of yogurt like never before. Has dairy free ever tasted so delicious?

name: Silk Almond Milk Dairy-Free Yogurt Alternative, Vanilla, Soy-Free, Gluten-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, 5.3 oz.
short_description: Single Serving Delight: One 5.3 oz container of Vanilla Almondmilk Yogurt Alternative

Great for All Diets: Free from cholesterol, dairy, soy, lactose, and gluten
Plant-Based Benefits: A delicious, dairy-free choice for plant-based lifestyles

product_description: Every spoonful of Silk Vanilla Almondmilk Yogurt Alternative offers a creamy indulgence with a dairy-free twist. We make our delightful yogurt alternative without any dairy, soy, lactose, gluten, carrageenan, or casein, embracing the delicious almond in all its rich flavor and velvety texture. Infused with the velvety sweetness of vanilla, this non-dairy yogurt makes for a delicious snack, whether enjoyed on its own or sprinkled with your favorite toppings. And best of all, it provides a nutritious jump start into your day with protein* and calcium. *4% Daily Value.

name: Cultures for Health Vegan Yogurt Starter Culture | 4 Direct-Set Packets | DIY Dairy-Free Yogurt from Plant Milks | Probiotic for Gut Health
short_description: LOW MAINTENANCE: This culture is direct-set, meaning it only cultures once, perfect for beginners or anyone who doesn't want to have to maintain a starter.

COST EFFECTIVE: With this starter you can culture up to 4 gallons of non dairy yogurt, effectively spending less than half what you'd pay for store-bought ready-made vegan yogurts, including cost of milk you'll use!

VEGAN: Make your own plant based yogurt from your favorite non dairy milk! Soy milk is the only kind that will naturally thicken without pectin, but you can also make delicious yogurt drinks from almond milk, oat milk, or whatever you like.
HEALTH BENEFITS: Yogurt contains probiotics for digestive health, and vegan yogurt contains just as many probiotics as dairy based yogurts. It's also a great source of vegan protein!
SAFE: Each batch is pathogen tested by a trusted third-party laboratory so you know you are getting a high quality, healthy starter to make delicious yogurt at home.

name: Andy Anand Handcrafted Greek Yogurt Almonds, Fresh & Natural Ingredients, Amazingly Delicious, No Preservatives, Perfect Gourmet Gift for All Occasions Ideal For Women, Men and Kids - (2 lb)
short_description: Indulge in Pure California Delight: Experience the exquisite taste of Andy Anand's handcrafted Greek yogurt almonds, a truly gourmet treat. Each premium almond is carefully roasted and generously enrobed in a smooth, tangy, and sweet Greek yogurt coating, creating an unbelievably delicious snack that combines creamy texture with a satisfying crunch.

True Artisan Craftsmanship: Step away from mass production and experience the human touch. Andy Anand creations are not simply manufactured; they are sculpted with passion by master artisans. A complete departure from the ordinary, these sweets offer a rich, authentic texture that defines the pinnacle of luxury.

The Perfect Gourmet Gift for Every Occasion: Elegantly presented and generously sized, these Greek yogurt almonds make an ideal gourmet gift for virtually any celebration. Surprise and delight women, men, and kids for birthdays, Valentine's Day, Christmas, holidays, anniversaries, corporate events, or simply as a thoughtful gesture to show you care.

Amazingly Delicious & Wholesome Snacking: Savor a snack that's both incredibly tasty and satisfying. The natural protein from the almonds combined with the creamy Greek yogurt coating offers a fulfilling and delicious treat. It's perfect for a mid-day pick-me-up, a delightful dessert alternative, or a sophisticated addition to any snack platter.

Artisanal Quality, Taste You Can Trust: Andy Anand stands for excellence. Our Greek yogurt almonds are a testament to artisanal craftsmanship, prepared in small batches to ensure consistent quality and unparalleled flavor. We guarantee a luxurious and delightful experience, bringing you a premium confection that reflects our dedication to the finest ingredients and meticulous preparation.

Made with Fresh & All-Natural Ingredients: Our commitment to quality means we use only the best. These gourmet Greek yogurt almonds are made with fresh and natural ingredients, ensuring a pure and authentic flavor profile. You can enjoy them guilt-free, knowing there are no preservatives or artificial additives, just wholesome goodness in every bite of this 2 lb (907g) bulk pack.

name: Silk Soy Milk Dairy-Free Yogurt Alternative, Strawberry, Gluten-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, 5.3 oz.
short_description: Easy to Enjoy: One 5.3 oz container of Silk Strawberry Soymilk Yogurt Alternative is delicious on its own or enjoy with your favorite toppings like granola or fruit
Tastes Good & Good for You: Smooth and creamy, this dairy free strawberry yogurt alternative is a good source of calcium and vitamin D
Plant Based Protein: Each serving of this non dairy yogurt has 6 grams of protein (12% DV) for a yummy vegan snack
Great for All Diets: With no cholesterol, dairy, lactose, gluten or artificial flavors, this vegan yogurt fits into your lifestyle
Sourcing: Silk strawberry soymilk plant-based yogurt is Non-GMO Project Verified
product_description: Indulge your taste buds with Silk Strawberry Soymilk Yogurt Alternative. This plant based, nondairy yogurt with live and active cultures is smooth and creamy and doesn’t skimp on flavor. There are no artificial sweeteners in this dairy free yogurt, and it’s also a good source of calcium and vitamin D, making Silk soymilk yogurt a great addition to your lifestyle. In addition, this strawberry yogurt alternative boasts 6 grams of plant-powered protein per serving (12% DV). This vegan yogurt has no gluten, lactose, dairy or cholesterol, so it’s a great choice for snackers. Use this strawberry yogurt alternative in your next breakfast bowl, post-workout smoothie or yogurt parfait. Or, use as a tasty vegan snack. At Silk, we believe in the real power of plants to improve where we live and how well we live. Silk lactose free yogurt is verified by the Non-GMO Project’s product verification program. Silk Soymilk Yogurt is also helping protect natural resources. Learn more about our story on our packaging. Plus, Silk is a brand of Danone North America, a Certified B Corp, joining people using business as a force for good(TM).

You can enjoy Kite Hill Almond Milk Yogurt plain or enhanced with natural ingredients in our delicious flavored varieties. At Kite Hill, we’re changing the game with great tasting plant-based foods that help people feel their best while making a positive impact on the planet, one bite at a time.
